Name: Loaded Charge - Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Yuan Ye charge toward the target, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG. If Yuan Ye hits the enemy, it will knock the enemy again to deal <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Physical DMG and stun the enemy for <color=#0f70bc>2s</color>.

Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Noctua fly one circle around the equipped character, dealing <color=#0f70bc>320%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies nearby while granting the character Super Armor for <color=#0f70bc>3s</color> and a shield with capacity equal to <color=#0f70bc>80%</color> of the CUB's Attack for 10s.

Name: Radiative Shock - Barrier: Dark
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

Name: Awakening Flash: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Toniris charge forward, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Physical attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>120%</color> AOE Physical DMG. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

Name: Surging Thunderbolt: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After tapping it, Toniris and the character in control will charge forward together, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Physical attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>120%</color> AOE Physical DMG. The equipped character is invincible while charging with Toniris. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

After tapping it, Toniris and the character in control will charge forward together, dealing <color=#0f70bc>1500%</color> Lightning DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Lightning attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>600%</color> AOE Lightning DMG. The equipped character is invincible while charging with Toniris. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Advanced Data Attack</color>.

Name: Landing Stomp: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Upon casting, Frost Oath will stomp from above, dealing <color=#0f70bc>150%</color> Physical DMG and applying <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color> to the target and generate a <color=#935ee1>Snowthorn Forest</color> field, dealing <color=#0f70bc>25%</color> Physical DMG for <color=#0f70bc>8s</color>. Adds <color=#935ee1>Advanced Data ATK</color>. <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

Upon casting, Frost Oath will stomp from above, dealing <color=#0f70bc>600%</color> Nihil DMG and applying <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color> to the target and generate a <color=#935ee1>Snowthorn Forest</color> field, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Nihil DMG for <color=#0f70bc>4s</color>. Adds <color=#935ee1>Data ATK</color>. <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

Name: Empowered Strike: Physical
Desc: The CUB button will light up after any 6 basic orbs have been pinged. Frost Oath will defend the active character, blocking attacks for 0.3s and stomping the enemy, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG and <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Physical DMG upon a successful block. Applies <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color> to the target and generate a <color=#935ee1>Snowthorn Forest</color> field, dealing <color=#0f70bc>25%</color> Physical DMG for <color=#0f70bc>8s</color>. Desc: Rosetta: Rigor summons the Forest Guard to perform a clustered attack when she charges the <color=#0f70bc>Low/Mid-power Electromagnetic Cannon</color>, dealing <color=#0f70bc>20%</color>/<color=#0f70bc>20%</color> Physical DMG to enemies in front, and slow down the enemies. Unleashing the <color=#0f70bc>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> will summon the Forest Guard to fire a volley on the target's location in a large area, dealing <color=#0f70bc>1600%</color> Physical DMG.

Name: Forest Guard Volley
Desc: Rosetta: Rigor summons the Forest Guard to perform a clustered attack when she charges the <color=#0f70bc>Low/Mid-power Electromagnetic Cannon</color>, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color>/<color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG to enemies in front, and slow down the enemies. Unleashing the <color=#0f70bc>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> will summon the Forest Guard to fire a volley on the target's location in a large area, dealing <color=#0f70bc>2000%</color> Physical DMG.

Name: Grenade Carnival: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Seeshell expand its shells to launch <color=#0f70bc>1</color> grenade from the turret. Each time Seeshell fires a grenade, there is a <color=#0f70bc>78%</color> chance to fire <color=#0f70bc>1</color> additional grenade, up to a total of <color=#0f70bc>9</color> grenades. Each grenade deals <color=#0f70bc>50%</color> AOE Physical DMG.

Name: Flaming Slash: Fire
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Successful Claw Attacks will end the Gaping Wound effect immediately, dealing DMG depending on the remaining duration.

Name: Supergravity Eclipse: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Upon casting, Moonhopper will teleport into the air and smash to the ground, interrupting enemy skills, dealing <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Physical DMG, and creating an Anti-gravity Field that deals <color=#0f70bc>20%</color> Physical DMG to all enemies inside every 0.5s for 4s. Enemies inside the Anti-gravity field will be slowed down and unable to use their skills.

Upon casting, Moonhopper will teleport into the air and smash to the ground, interrupting enemy skills, dealing <color=#0f70bc>800%</color> Physical DMG, and creating an Anti-gravity Field that deals <color=#0f70bc>400%</color> Physical DMG upon its creation. The Anti-gravity Field lasts 2s, in which enemies will be slowed down and unable to use their skills.

Name: "Bye-bye Home Run"
Desc: When Karenina: Scire performs her Signature Move while carrying Moonhopper, Moonhopper will be swung to the enemy, increasing the Signature Move's Base DMG Bonus by <color=#0f70bc>20%</color>. While Karenina: Scire is charging up by holding the Basic Attack button, Moonhopper will pull in surrounding enemies and unleash <color=#935ee1>Super Moonfall Field</color>.

Name: Refraction Siphon: Physical

After casting, Rainbow will swim to the target, pull enemies within range, and deal <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG. Name: Wheel Drift: Lightning

After casting, Motorbolt will rush to the enemy and drift, knocking enemies within range airborne and dealing <color=#0f70bc>400%</color> Lightning DMG. When Motorbolt is equipped by Lucia: Crimson Weave, it will enter Standby Mode upon casting the Active Skill. Afterward, Lucia: Crimson Weave will ride Motorbolt upon casting <color=#0f70bc>Resolute Blow</color> with the kodachi, sprinting to the target before pulling enemies within range and knocking them airborne. Motorbolt deals <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Lightning DMG to the enemies within range during so.

Name: Ion Realm: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Hades Fangs will spin in mid-air and slam the enemy, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG and applying <color=#0f70bc>Rigidity</color> to the enemy. Generates a purple lightning area on hit that lasts for 2.4s and deals <color=#0f70bc>15%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies in it once every 0.2s. <color=#0f70bc>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

Casting <color=#0f70bc>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color> and <color=#0f70bc>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color> will summon Dawn Chorus to launch a joint attack, dealing <color=#0f70bc>500%</color> Physical DMG.

Name: Terrifying Vortex: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Cetus will leap up, dive to the target location, and generate a vortex, dealing <color=#FF6347>320%</color> Physical DMG and applying Rigidity. <color=#935ee1>Rigidity</color>: Immobilizes the enemy for 2s.

Name: Proximity Interference: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Shadow Wing will start to circle, granting the equipped character Shield equal to <color=#0f70bc>40%</color> of its ATK. At the end of the flight, Shadow Wing will spread its wings and deal <color=#0f70bc>150%</color> Physical DMG twice to the area around the target.

If the carrier is not Vergil, after casting, the Netherworld Arm will deal <color=#FF6347>250%</color> Fire DMG 8 times with Blistering Blades. If the carrier is Vergil, the Netherworld Arm will enhance <color=#0f70bc>Devil Hunter Skill - Blistering/Heavy Rain Blades</color> and <color=#0f70bc>Devil Hunter Skill - Storm/Spiral Blades</color>.

Name: Dance of Swords

Upon entering the battlefield for the first time or casting <color=#0f70bc>Judgment Cut End</color>, Mirage Blades can get ready for a joint attack through <color=#0f70bc>Sin Devil Trigger</color>. Upon casting <color=#0f70bc>Million Stab/Yamato Combo's</color> triple slash, Mirage Blades will cast <color=#0f70bc>Blistering</color>, dealing <color=#0f70bc>75%</color> Physical DMG 8 times. Name: Road Rash
Desc: When Dante carries Cavaliere, tap the Netherworld Arm button that is <color=#0f70bc>not charged</color> to release <color=#0f70bc>Cavaliere</color> while summoning <color=#0f70bc>Conjured Swords</color> to attack the enemy. The first tap will cast <color=#0f70bc>Cavaliere - Redline</color>, which will be regarded as <color=#0f70bc>Stinger</color> and deal <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> of the skill's Fire DMG. Tapping the button during Cavaliere - Redline will cast <color=#0f70bc>Cavaliere - Aerial Slash</color>, which will be regarded as <color=#0f70bc>Million Stab</color> and deal <color=#0f70bc>160%</color> of the skill's Fire DMG. Tapping Basic Attack during <color=#0f70bc>Aerial Slash</color> will cast <color=#0f70bc>Cavaliere - Aerial Combo</color>, which will be regarded as <color=#0f70bc>DSD Combo</color> and deal <color=#0f70bc>65%</color> of the skill's Fire DMG. Base DMG of <color=#0f70bc>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> and <color=#0f70bc>SDT - Final Judgement</color> increases by 25%.

Tapping Basic Attack during <color=#0f70bc>Aerial Slash</color> will cast <color=#0f70bc>Cavaliere - Aerial Combo</color>, which will be regarded as <color=#0f70bc>DSD Combo</color> and deal <color=#0f70bc>65%</color> of the skill's Fire DMG. Base DMG of <color=#0f70bc>SDT - Sin Inferno</color> and <color=#0f70bc>SDT - Final Judgement</color> increases by 75%.

Name: Scale Shock: Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. After casting, Scaled Rampart will immediately transform into a shield, dealing <color=#FF6347>400%</color> Physical DMG and pulling in enemies. This can block one attack within a short period of time. A successful block triggers a fan-shaped counterattack, dealing equivalent Physical DMG.

Name: Synergetic Enhancement
Desc: When Veronica: Aegis, with Scaled Rampart equipped, casts <color=#0f70bc>Piercing Judgment</color> with <color=#0f70bc>Sin Mark</color> or casts <color=#0f70bc>Torrential Blast</color> for the first time after entering <color=#0f70bc>Execution</color>, she will summon Scaled Rampart to launch a joint two-hit attack, dealing <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> and <color=#0f70bc>400%</color> Physical DMG respectively. Base DMG of <color=#0f70bc>Blazing Desolation</color> and <color=#0f70bc>Ruinous Ember</color> increases by <color=#0f70bc>4%</color>.

Name: Radiant Alliance
Desc: When Liv: Limpidity casts <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color> and the <color=#D91414>4th hit of Mirror Blade Orb</color> with Levvi equipped, she will summon Levvi to launch a joint attack, dealing <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Lightning DMG 3 times. Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Cosmic Rebirth</color> increases by <color=#0f70bc>15%</color>; when casting at max Delicate Heart stacks, it increases by a further <color=#0f70bc>15%</color>.
